movie.title: Direct Action
movie.description_intro: Frank Gannon, a veteran cop, is being hunted by his fellow police officers after they learned he has betrayed the brotherhood and exposed to the feds wide scale corruption of the LAPD. He has one day left to prove his case and survive.
movie.description_full: Frank Gannon, a veteran cop, is being hunted by his fellow police officers after they learned he has betrayed the brotherhood and exposed to the feds wide scale corruption of the LAPD. He has one day left to prove his case and survive.

movies.title: The Rodeo Thief
movies.summary: An injured bull rider, that's seen his best days in the rodeo, agrees to steal roping horses for an unforgiving loan shark.
movies.description_full: An injured bull rider, that's seen his best days in the rodeo, agrees to steal roping horses for an unforgiving loan shark.
movies.synopsis: An injured bull rider, that's seen his best days in the rodeo, agrees to steal roping horses for an unforgiving loan shark.

movies.title: Project X
movies.summary: A young inductee into the military is given the task of looking after some chimpanzees used in the mysterious "Project X". Getting to know the chimps fairly well, he begins to suspect there is more to the secret project than he is being told.
movies.description_full: A young inductee into the military is given the task of looking after some chimpanzees used in the mysterious "Project X". Getting to know the chimps fairly well, he begins to suspect there is more to the secret project than he is being told.

movies.title: The Return of the Living Dead
movies.title_english: The Return of the Living Dead
movies.title_long: The Return of the Living Dead (1985)
movies.summary: When a bumbling pair of employees at a medical supply warehouse accidentally release a deadly gas into the air, the vapors cause the dead to re-animate as they go on a rampage through Louisville, Kentucky seeking their favorite food, brains.
movies.description_full: When a bumbling pair of employees at a medical supply warehouse accidentally release a deadly gas into the air, the vapors cause the dead to re-animate as they go on a rampage through Louisville, Kentucky seeking their favorite food, brains.
movies.synopsis: When a bumbling pair of employees at a medical supply warehouse accidentally release a deadly gas into the air, the vapors cause the dead to re-animate as they go on a rampage through Louisville, Kentucky seeking their favorite food, brains.

movies.title: Vansh
movies.summary: Justice Krishnakant Dharmadhikari is assigned to Chair an inquiry commission against Mantri Vilasrao Chaudhary. While gathering evidence against the later, he must also deal with family problems - arising out of his bigamous relationship with Tulsi and Rukmani; Tulsi's children, Geeta and Siddharth; Rukmani's son, Inspector Gautam; the hostility displayed by his aging mother against Tulsi and her children. As well as the growing anger and animosity between Gautam and Siddharth - who have only one thing in common - hatred for their father.

As well as the growing anger and animosity between Gautam and Siddharth - who have only one thing in common - hatred for their father.
